channel.title: Clay on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Clay on Stats On the T

item.title: French Open Predictions
item.description: We are a day away from the first round of the 2018 French Open. Who are tennis fans most likely to see in the final stages of the event? And who among the top contenders were favoured by this year’s draw?

item.title: Most Improved Among French Open Seeds
item.description: As tennis prepares for the second slam of the season, we look at the players who have raised their game the most in the past year.

item.title: Alexander Zverev's Evolution on Clay
item.description: Alexander Zverev has a chance to bag a second clay-court Masters title for the year having already reached the quarterfinals in Rome. Whether he defends his Rome title or not, 2018 is shaping up to be Zverev’s best career performance on clay so far. How has he managed to raise his game on the red dirt?

item.title: In His Return, Nadal is Making Every Minute Count
item.description: With his first major clay event in 2018, Nadal has set the stage for one of the most efficient clay seasons of his career.

item.title: Nadal Set for a 2017 Clay Season Repeat
item.description: As the tour prepares for Monte Carlo, Rafael Nadal finds himself at the top of the clay-adjusted Elo ratings for the first time since 2014.
